Understat-DB CLI

CLI for creating a soccer database with data from understat.com

Initialise the app with Typer

class EnvTyper[source]

EnvTyper(name:Optional[str]=<typer.models.DefaultPlaceholder object at 0x11080eac8>, invoke_without_command:bool=<typer.models.DefaultPlaceholder object at 0x110826f60>, no_args_is_help:Optional[bool]=<typer.models.DefaultPlaceholder object at 0x11082c198>, subcommand_metavar:Optional[str]=<typer.models.DefaultPlaceholder object at 0x11082c1d0>, chain:bool=<typer.models.DefaultPlaceholder object at 0x11082c208>, result_callback:Optional[Callable[Ellipsis, Any]]=<typer.models.DefaultPlaceholder object at 0x11082c240>, context_settings:Optional[Dict[Any, Any]]=<typer.models.DefaultPlaceholder object at 0x11082c278>, callback:Optional[Callable[Ellipsis, Any]]=<typer.models.DefaultPlaceholder object at 0x11082c2b0>, help:Optional[str]=<typer.models.DefaultPlaceholder object at 0x11082c2e8>, epilog:Optional[str]=<typer.models.DefaultPlaceholder object at 0x11082c320>, short_help:Optional[str]=<typer.models.DefaultPlaceholder object at 0x11082c358>, options_metavar:str=<typer.models.DefaultPlaceholder object at 0x11082c390>, add_help_option:bool=<typer.models.DefaultPlaceholder object at 0x11082c3c8>, hidden:bool=<typer.models.DefaultPlaceholder object at 0x11082c400>, deprecated:bool=<typer.models.DefaultPlaceholder object at 0x11082c438>, add_completion:bool=True) :: Typer

Just like typer.Typer, except it loads the environment with dotenv.load_dotenv before executing any command.

Migrate

Migrating the database

migrate[source]

migrate(interactive:bool=True)

Migrate database to the current schema (as defined in nbs/db.ipynb)

dbt runner

(Re-)build tables from base data using dbt (data-build-tool)'s (unsupported) python API

build_tables[source]

build_tables(args:List[str]=<typer.models.OptionInfo object at 0x110805a90>)

Build tables from base data using dbt

Ingest

Ingest base understat data and build understat tables from base data

ingest[source]

ingest(refresh:bool=False, leagues:List[str]=<typer.models.OptionInfo object at 0x110805b38>, seasons:List[int]=<typer.models.OptionInfo object at 0x110805da0>)

Ingest match and shot data from Understat.com

Finally, make the app executable from the command line
